sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_vote ( id char(32) not null, votemark int4 not null, text varchar(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, expireddate timestamp, status int4 not null, groups bool not null, anonymous bool not null, logging bool not null, multiple int2 not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
create table sf_voter ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, contentid) );

create table sf_vote_group ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, multiple int2 not null, description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, text) );

create table sf_vote_item ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, groupid char(32), text varchar(32) not null, votes int4 not null, description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(voteid, groupid, text) );

create table sf_vote_log ( id char(32) not null, voteid char(32) not null, itemid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32), ip varchar(32), primary key(id), unique(itemid, userid) );
